name: My Farm Shop
description:
Play this brand new experience for FREE, become part of an engaging story full of romance and surprises, and test your time management skills.
In Farm Shop: Judy & Jake you run your business, serve new customers and discover the ecofriendly supply of your own market.

- Immerse yourself in a romantic adventure
- Discover 20 levels (more to come!) related to life in the countryside
- Prove yourself in ever more exciting time management challenges
- Combine ingredients, master exciting mini-games and make your customers happy
- Learn how to protect the environment
- Improve your own market with new products and upgrades

Will Judy be able to fulfill her dream with your help? How will the story continue? Find out!

Do you like our game?
Feel free to send a message to community@gamebros-studio.com
We are always happy about feedback!

Your GameBros Team
